channel.title: So annoyed- Help or dont say anything - PK point shop
channel.description:
Ok i've asked around and searched google and many forums and have had no luck with a good answer
I have made a pk point shop I have added all the items in shops.cfg how do i change the items Price to pk points instead of gold?? If its in item.cfg which exact number do i replace? please I need specifics

item.title: So annoyed- Help or dont say anything - PK point shop
item.dc:creator: @Gypsy Gypsy
item.description:
@Gypsy wrote:

I am asking how to add an int that will let me change an items price to Pk points instead of Gold

Read full topic
item.source: So annoyed- Help or dont say anything - PK point shop

item.title: So annoyed- Help or dont say anything - PK point shop
item.dc:creator: @ricky_james ricky james
item.description:
@ricky_james wrote:

[quote=“Gypsy, post:6, topic:335493”][quote author=ricky james link=topic=431874.msg3170177#msg3170177 date=1270363970]

I said help or dont say anything
[/quote]I’m not seeing it.

It’s the name of my thread moron. Stop trying to raise your post count by spamming my thread with useless posts when I need real help to release my server.[/quote]Post count wow, I dont care about post count. I’m saying you should read the rules. Maybe a million time to get them into your head.

Read full topic
